alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:22PM MDT until August 03 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL EL PASO COUNTY... At 422 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cimarron Hills, or 8 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Eastern Colorado Springs, Falcon, Cimarron Hills, Peterson Space Force Base and Schriever Space Force Base. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
